column4: please i need some help guys, my computer is not loading from usb drive for some reason :( so i really need help setting up PXE
yes, it recognizes the usb device as well in bios, the usb stick is bootable
Did you try hitting F12 for boot menu?  (Or what ever F-Key it says?)
In order to do pxe boot you need to set up a pxe server and set your router up to point pxe boots to it.
